headline: Asana, MongoDB, Datadog, Elastic, and Atlassian Shares Are Falling, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the morning session after a broad sell-off swept through the software sector, driven by growing concerns about the impact of artificial intelligence. This led to institutional repositioning as traders pivot away from traditional SaaS providers in favor of companies with more defensible, AI-integrated moats. The tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite index declined by 0.8%, while the broader S&P 500 also slipped.
